READ TABLE lt_codeid ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<lfs_codeid>) WITH KEY systemid = ls_standard_codes-systemid
LOOP AT <lfs_codeid>-codeidselection ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<lfs_codeidselection>) WHERE iud NE 'D'.
DATA lo_nd_error_code TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_node.
DATA lo_nd_error_code_ui TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_node.

* READ TABLE lt_change_log ASSIGNING <lfs_change_log_new> WITH KEY new = abap_true.
SORT lt_change_log BY version_id DESCENDING log_id DESCENDING.
* DATA: lo_excel TYPE REF TO cl_fdt_xl_spreadsheet.
DATA lo_nd_ch_topology TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_node.
DATA lo_el_ch_topology TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_element.

DATA lo_nd_districts TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_node.
DATA lo_nd_municipalities TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_node.
DATA lt_dd03p TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF dd03p.
DATA lo_type_descr TYPE REF TO cl_abap_typedescr.
DATA lr_data_line TYPE REF TO data.
"Die 3 Tabellen innerhalb der Strucktur /BVCCSAP/K7_CH_TOPOL_DATA_TS werden abgerarbeitet
"und die Daten aus dem XML File extrahiert
ASSIGN COMPONENT <lfs_dd03>-fieldname OF STRUCTURE ls_ch_topology TO <lfs_data_table>.
CREATE DATA lr_data_line LIKE LINE OF <lfs_data_table>.
"Ist das XML Tab aus der Dictionary Struktur im XML File vorhanden?
"Zu den XML Tags <cantons>/<districts>/<municipalities> die Kinder beschaffen.
"und die Daten daraus in einen einzelne Datenzeile übertragen.
"Das Attribut mit entsprechenden Namen auf das Feld der Datenzeile verknüpfen
ASSIGN COMPONENT lo_attribute->get_name( ) OF STRUCTURE <lfs_data_line> TO <lfs_attr>.
"Die extrahierten Daten übertragen und in den Kontext überführen
DATA lo_nd_error_code TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_node.
DATA ls_error_code LIKE LINE OF lt_error_code.
DATA: lo_ws_data TYPE REF TO data.
"Löschen der Felder die nicht in der Importsstuktur vorkommen
"Import Attribute des Contextknoten gegen Import Header prüfen
ASSIGN COMPONENT sy-index OF STRUCTURE <lfs_ws_head_row> TO <lfs_ws_head_cell>.
READ TABLE lt_attr_name ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<lfs_attr>) WITH KEY table_line = <lfs_ws_head_cell>.
ASSIGN COMPONENT sy-index OF STRUCTURE <lfs_ws_head_row> TO <lfs_ws_head_cell>.
ASSIGN COMPONENT sy-index OF STRUCTURE <lfs_ws_row> TO <lfs_ws_cell>.
ASSIGN COMPONENT <lfs_ws_head_cell> OF STRUCTURE ls_error_code TO <lfs_ec_field>.
READ TABLE lt_attr_name TRANSPORTING NO FIELDS WITH KEY table_line = 'MESSAGEID_FULL'.
ASSIGN COMPONENT sy-tabix OF STRUCTURE <lfs_ws_row> TO FIELD-SYMBOL(<lfs_field_messageid_full>).
READ TABLE lt_attr_name TRANSPORTING NO FIELDS WITH KEY table_line = 'SYSTEMID'.
ASSIGN COMPONENT sy-tabix OF STRUCTURE <lfs_ws_row> TO FIELD-SYMBOL(<lfs_systemid>).
READ TABLE lt_attr_name TRANSPORTING NO FIELDS WITH KEY table_line = 'SERVICEID'.
ASSIGN COMPONENT sy-tabix OF STRUCTURE <lfs_ws_row> TO FIELD-SYMBOL(<lfs_serviceid>).
READ TABLE lt_attr_name TRANSPORTING NO FIELDS WITH KEY table_line = 'MESSAGEID'.
ASSIGN COMPONENT sy-tabix OF STRUCTURE <lfs_ws_row> TO FIELD-SYMBOL(<lfs_messageid>).
AND NOT ( <lfs_ws_cell> EQ 'I' OR <lfs_ws_cell> EQ 'U' OR <lfs_ws_cell> EQ 'D' ).
wd_this->wd_get_api( )->get_message_manager( )->report_error_message( EXPORTING message_text = |IUD Aktion : | && <lfs_ws_cell> && | ist unbekannt| ).
"Wenn "Differential Load" vorhanden, dann werden nur die Einträge mit I/U/D übernommen.
READ TABLE /bvccsap/cl_k7_codelist_data=>gt_systemid TRANSPORTING NO FIELDS WITH KEY systemid = <lfs_ws_cell>.
READ TABLE /bvccsap/cl_k7_codelist_data=>gt_serviceid TRANSPORTING NO FIELDS WITH KEY serviceid = <lfs_ws_cell>.
READ TABLE lt_error_code TRANSPORTING NO FIELDS WITH KEY messageid_full = lv_messageid_full.
DATA lo_nd_codelist_type TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_node.
DATA lo_el_codelist_type TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_element.
DATA lo_nd_load_type TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_node.
DATA lo_el_load_type TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_element.

DATA lo_el_import_file TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_element.

DATA lo_el_ctr_control TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_element.

DATA lo_nd_codelist_version TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_node.
DATA lo_el_codelist_version TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_element.
DATA lo_nd_infocarrier TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_node.
DATA ls_infocarrier LIKE LINE OF lt_infocarrier.
DATA: lo_ws_data TYPE REF TO data.
"Löschen der Felder die nicht in der Importsstuktur vorkommen
"Import Attribute des Contextknoten gegen Import Header prüfen
ASSIGN COMPONENT sy-index OF STRUCTURE <lfs_ws_head_row> TO <lfs_ws_head_cell>.
READ TABLE lt_attr_name TRANSPORTING NO FIELDS WITH KEY table_line = <lfs_ws_head_cell>.
ASSIGN COMPONENT sy-index OF STRUCTURE <lfs_ws_head_row> TO <lfs_ws_head_cell>.
ASSIGN COMPONENT sy-index OF STRUCTURE <lfs_ws_row> TO <lfs_ws_cell>.
ASSIGN COMPONENT <lfs_ws_head_cell> OF STRUCTURE ls_infocarrier TO <lfs_ic_field>.
AND NOT ( <lfs_ws_cell> EQ 'I' OR <lfs_ws_cell> EQ 'U' OR <lfs_ws_cell> EQ 'D' ).
wd_this->wd_get_api( )->get_message_manager( )->report_error_message( EXPORTING message_text = |IUD Aktion : | && <lfs_ws_cell> && | ist unbekannt| ).
"Wenn "Differential Load" vorhanden, dann werden nur die Einträge mit I/U/D übernommen.
READ TABLE lt_infocarrier TRANSPORTING NO FIELDS WITH KEY info_carrier_id = <lfs_ws_cell>.
ASSIGN COMPONENT 'REC_STATE_DDMM' OF STRUCTURE ls_infocarrier TO <lfs_rec_state_ddmm>.
IF <lfs_ws_cell> IS NOT INITIAL AND <lfs_ws_cell> CO '#'.
<lfs_rec_state_ddmm> = replace( val = <lfs_ws_cell> case = abap_false sub = wd_assist->gc_rec_state_checked && | | with = || ).
<lfs_rec_state_ddmm> = replace( val = <lfs_ws_cell> case = abap_false sub = wd_assist->gc_rec_state_not_used && | | with = || ).
DATA ls_formular_category LIKE LINE OF wd_this->mt_formular_category.
READ TABLE wd_this->mt_formular_category INTO ls_formular_category WITH KEY ddtext = <lfs_ws_cell>.
DATA ls_bus_data_context LIKE LINE OF wd_this->mt_bus_data_context.
<lfs_ws_cell> = replace( val = <lfs_ws_cell> case = abap_false sub = |NULL| with = || ).
READ TABLE wd_this->mt_bus_data_context INTO ls_bus_data_context WITH KEY bus_data_context = <lfs_ws_cell>.
DATA ls_codeid_import LIKE LINE OF lt_codeid_import.
DATA: lo_ws_data TYPE REF TO data.
DATA lo_struct_descr TYPE REF TO cl_abap_structdescr.
"Löschen der Felder die nicht in der Importsstuktur vorkommen
"Import Attribute des Contextknoten gegen Import Header prüfen
ASSIGN COMPONENT sy-index OF STRUCTURE <lfs_ws_head_row> TO <lfs_ws_head_cell>.
READ TABLE lt_attr_name TRANSPORTING NO FIELDS WITH KEY table_line = <lfs_ws_head_cell>.
ASSIGN COMPONENT sy-index OF STRUCTURE <lfs_ws_head_row> TO <lfs_ws_head_cell>.
ASSIGN COMPONENT sy-index OF STRUCTURE <lfs_ws_row> TO <lfs_ws_cell>.
ASSIGN COMPONENT <lfs_ws_head_cell> OF STRUCTURE ls_codeid_import TO <lfs_ws_field>.
ASSIGN COMPONENT 'B' OF STRUCTURE <lfs_ws_row> TO FIELD-SYMBOL(<lfs_field_systemid>).
ASSIGN COMPONENT 'C' OF STRUCTURE <lfs_ws_row> TO FIELD-SYMBOL(<lfs_field_codeid>).
ASSIGN COMPONENT 'D' OF STRUCTURE <lfs_ws_row> TO FIELD-SYMBOL(<lfs_field_codeiddesc>).
AND NOT ( <lfs_ws_cell> EQ 'I' OR <lfs_ws_cell> EQ 'U' OR <lfs_ws_cell> EQ 'D' ).
wd_this->wd_get_api( )->get_message_manager( )->report_error_message( EXPORTING message_text = |IUD Aktion : | && <lfs_ws_cell> && | ist unbekannt| ).
"Wenn "Differential Load" vorhanden, dann werden nur die Einträge mit I/U/D übernommen.
IF <lfs_ws_cell> IS NOT INITIAL AND <lfs_ws_cell> CO '#'.
READ TABLE /bvccsap/cl_k7_codelist_data=>gt_systemid TRANSPORTING NO FIELDS WITH KEY systemid = <lfs_ws_cell>.
READ TABLE wd_this->mt_codeid TRANSPORTING NO FIELDS WITH KEY codeid = <lfs_ws_cell>.
READ TABLE lt_codeid ASSIGNING <lfs_codeid> WITH KEY systemid = <lfs_codeid_import>-systemid
READ TABLE <lfs_codeid>-codeidvalues ASSIGNING <lfs_codeidvalue> WITH KEY codeidvalue = <lfs_codeid_import>-codeidvalue.
LOOP AT lo_struct_descr->components ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<lfs_comp_descr>) WHERE name(15) = 'CODEVALUEIDDESC'.
ASSIGN COMPONENT sy-tabix OF STRUCTURE <lfs_codeid_import> TO <lfs_ws_field>.
READ TABLE <lfs_codeidvalue>-codeidvaluedesc ASSIGNING <lfs_codeidvaluedesc> WITH KEY spras = lv_spras.

DATA lo_el_ui_control TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_element.
"Prüfen ob eine neue CodeID bereits existiert
READ TABLE lt_message INTO ls_message WITH KEY attribute_name = 'CODEID'.
"Wenn SAP Standard Code, dann wird die Bearbeitungsleiste eingeblendet
"Es wird ein neuer Code eingefügt und für diesen müssen
LOOP AT <lfs_standard_code1>-codeidselection[] ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<lfs_codeidselection>) WHERE codeid IS INITIAL.
"Wen die Aktion nicht löschen ist werden die Domänenwerte aus dem Datenelement abgeleitet
